title: Authors and Citation
text: Singh T (2024). rxy: Different outputs correlations y x. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rxy: Different outputs for correlations between y and x},   author = {Tegh Singh},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: RXY Plot Function — plot.ryx
text: Plots correlations dependent variable y one independent x variables.

title: Printing RYX Function — print.ryx
text: Prints RXY function neat clean way

title: The base RYX Function — ryx
text: Base function gives correlations dependent variable y one independent x variables.

title: The base RYX Function — ryx
text: data dataset used y dependent variable x independent variable variables

title: The base RYX Function — ryx
text: returns chart correlations y x r values p-values

title: The base RYX Function — ryx
code: library(MASS) data(Boston) summary(ryx(Boston, y="medv")) #> Correlating medv with crim zn indus nox rm age dis tax ptratio black lstat  #> The median absolute correlation was 0.427 with a range from -0.738 to 0.695  #> 11 out of 11 variables were significant at the p < 0.05 level.

title: Written summary of results — summary.ryx
text: Printing written summary results rxy function

title: Written summary of results — summary.ryx
code: library(MASS) data(Boston) summary(ryx(Boston, y="medv")) #> Correlating medv with crim zn indus nox rm age dis tax ptratio black lstat  #> The median absolute correlation was 0.427 with a range from -0.738 to 0.695  #> 11 out of 11 variables were significant at the p < 0.05 level.
